paper_abstract: In this paper, Picard method is proposed to solve the fuzzy second-order nonlinear Volterra-Fredholm integro-differential equation (FVFIDE) with fuzzy initial conditions under generalized H-differentiability. The existence and uniqueness of the solution and convergence of the proposed method are proved in details. Finally, the method is illustrated by solving some examples.
paper_title: Solving fuzzy second-order nonlinear Volterra-Fredholm integro-differential equations by using Picard method
